author_ssm: Tom Frusciano.  Electronic version produced by Leslie Barnes. Additional processing by Shannon McDonald in 2013.
unittitle_ssm: Ivan L. Bennett Speeches
abstract_ssm: Ivan L. Bennett was Acting President of New York University (NYU) from 1979 to 1981. This collection contains 76 speeches and remarks he delivered during his tenure, along with related correspondence, memoranda, and drafts.
corpname_ssm: New York University. Office of the President
